channel.title: Almost working Flying carpet system
channel.description:
i want to add this in my dessert based server.
well i was wondering if anyone has a fully working or almost fully working flying carpet system with npc dialouge (or how ever you spell it) that has like a option that you click and it teles you to pollveneach or what ever or something. or post a link to the tut with this stuff, or could you attempt to make the tut, if you can then either PM me or post here when it will be done and stuff. i tried making this but i messed up on the npc dialogue thing and got some errors so i just gave up lol. Please and Thankyou! :D
